About.title: About
About.description.part1: Nowadays it's quite common to share rented apartments with roommates. Everyone has their own reasons for doing so but some common reasons include: splitting costs of rent and utilities, not wanting to live alone, trying to improve living conditions, and the list goes on. The fact is, living alone can be overly expensive. By sharing our living space with other people, we can cut costs drastically while maintaining better living conditions. The only problem is how can you find that “perfect” roommate?
About.description.part2: From my personal experience and thorough research, I can say that there is nothing worse than sharing a living space with someone who you don’t connect with. Living with another person is like entering in an agreement. You must adapt to each other’s living habits , share responsibility in keeping your place clean, and be mindful of one another. Without this understanding between you and your roommate, numerous disagreements can and will arise.   Today we offer you a new and unique algorithm that allows you to find the “ideal” roommate in no time ! Our service is free and hassle free.
About.epigraph: "My house is my Castle"- Edward Coke.
